title: End the foreign aid
author: VD
content_html:
After all, giving money to UN member states that oppose the US moving its embassy in Israel is not only anti-American, but anti-Semitic:

The UN General Assembly has voted 128 to 9, with 35 abstentions, to adopt a motion rejecting the US decision to recognize Jerusalem as Israel’s capital.

That is despite the US President threatening to cut billions of dollars in aid to countries that dared to defy him. Trump had said ahead of the vote that ‘we’re watching’ the outcome, while Nikki Haley, his representative, had warned that the US would be ‘taking names’.

Trump usually follows through on his public threats, so the shrieking and crying promises to be epic.
